    Councilor Steve Novick

    City Councilor
    Pronouns
    He/Him
    District
    District 3
    I'm one of the three councilors representing District 3 (inner Southeast Portland, reaching north to Sandy Blvd. and east to I-205.).

    • Current position

      City Councilor: Elected as City Councilor for District 3 in November 2024 and began their term of office in January 2025.
